div.div: Time-lagged relationship between local spring warmth (warmth sum) and the NAO winter index.
div.p: Values of the NAO WI are for the winter of the year before, i.e. warmth sum for year i, NAO WI for year i-1. Least squares regression equation is: warmth sum i = 701â€“21.8 NAO WI i-1, R 2 = 0.426, P < 0.001.
